ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Xanthan Gum, Glyceryl Oleate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Bisabolol, Chamomilla Recutita Extract, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Parfum, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Sodium Hydroxide.
